EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-02-25-Executive-Dinner-EMEA.EMAIL-Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}'s Confirmation - VMTurbo Executive Dinner February 25th 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, We look forward to hosting you at our private Executive Dinner this Thursday, February 25th at 7PM at Gordon Ramsay's maze Executive Dinner London Thursday, February 25, 2016 7:00 PM maze, 10-13 Grosvenor Square, London W1K 6JP <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Maze+Grill+Mayfair/@51.5126076,-0.1529878,17z/data=!4m7!1m4!3m3!1s0x0:0x0!2zNTHCsDMwJzQ1LjQiTiAwwrAwOScwMi45Ilc!3b1!3m1!1s0x0000000000000000:0x1a7045312302029b]]> Business Casual Attire See you there! -The VMTurbo Team
